headline: Is Kroger (KR) Worth A Closer Look After Strong Multi Year Share Price Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Kroger at around US$64.25 is a fair price or an opportunity, you are in the right place for a clear, valuation focused look at the stock. Kroger’s share price sits at US$64.25 after returns of 1.7% over 7 days, 2.1% over 30 days, 2.0% year to date, 11.7% over 1 year, 52.5% over 3 years, and 107.2% over 5 years. Recent coverage of Kroger has focused on its position in US grocery retail and how investors are thinking about large, established supermarket chains in a...

headline: Amazon targets Walmart crown in $883 billion grocery battle
summary: Grocery is a huge business. I learned that early on. My first job as a bagger at the local grocery store eventually led to my first full-time job helping manage a store for a major supermarket chain. I saw firsthand in the late 1980s and early 1990s how Walmart sent shockwaves through the industry ...
